rows.label: qev060104_MSG0001
rows.name:
Are you here to pick up that fuel cell for the
Zaruboggan? Oh, thank heavens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0002
rows.name:
I bought a curious alien machine from a BLADE,
but got more than I bargained for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0003
rows.name:
The way the fuel cell powering it is designed,
one little slip and this whole neighborhood would
be uninhabitable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0004
rows.name: I didn't know what I was going to do with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0005
rows.name: Here you are. Do handle it carefully now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Oh, and do you know a BLADE by the name of
Roselle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0008
rows.name:
She's been asking around about Shiraton and the
Zaruboggan. She's rather...persistent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0009
rows.name:
And when she left, she told me to call her the next time
I had something I didn't know how to dispose of.
Handed me a business card and everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask Graham if he'll start going
to her instead of Shiraton.

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0010
rows.name:
She asked how many people the Zaruboggan were
gathering these sorts of waste materials from.
Things like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0011
rows.name:
She was also extremely eager to know how they
processed the stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I found her to be suspicious as all get-out,
so I didn't tell her a thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0013
rows.name:
Never! Not when there are good people like Shiraton
eager to do it free of charge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0014
rows.name:
I wouldn't trust that woman with last night's leftovers,
let alone hazardous materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0015
rows.name:
If you're headed to see Shiraton, tell him to watch out
for that Roselle woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060104_MSG0016
rows.name:
I have no idea who she is or what she's up to,
but my gut tells me that it isn't good.[ST:wait ]
